original_text: Now when much time was spent, and when sailing was now dangerous, because the fast was now already past, Paul admonished them,
korean_text: 여러 날이 걸려 금식하는 절기가 이미 지났으므로 항해하기가 위태한지라 바울이 그들을 권하여

sentences.original_text: Now when much time was spent
and when sailing was now dangerous
because the fast was now already past
sentences.korean_translation: 이유는 금식 기간이 이미 지났기 때문이었습니다
